backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom backend with access control, blob storage, message/reaction management, user profiles, active user tracking, and chatroom CRUD operations including password-protected deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: adding a character count progress bar to the chat input and removing the extra top border from the chat input area.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing component functionality, styling, state management, and recent changes across the React application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting user avatars via file upload, Giphy search/trending GIFs, or removal, with debounced search and request deduplication.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll, reply functionality, message filtering (hides Creator messages without media), and scroll-to-message highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating a new chatroom with topic, description, category selection, and media upload (image, YouTube/Twitch video, or Twitter post). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and loads Twitter widgets for post previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with app logo, username editing functionality with character limit progress bar, avatar picker button, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced to keep the app anonymous.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, and embedded media (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, images, voice). Supports pinning videos, adding/removing emoji reactions, and replying to messages with scroll-to functionality.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area, media attachment support (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video URLs, Twitter posts), voice recording with timer, and validation for all media types. Includes character limit tracking and upload progress display.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button, rendered in a fixed aspect-ratio container at the top of the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that returns a debounced version of a value, delaying updates until the specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal for loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using @dfinity/auth-client. Manages identity state, login status, and persists authentication across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including chatroom CRUD, messages, reactions, user profiles, and search. Manages query keys, caching strategies, and localStorage for user identity/preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-optimized viewport handling, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers in compact notation (k, M, B) for displaying large counts in a human-readable format.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images while preserving orientation, with configurable quality and dimension limits.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Main chatroom page component that fetches chatroom data, handles view count increment, and renders the ChatArea component with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page displaying all chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, plus a create chatroom dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating two in-progress fix requests: restoring character count progress bar to chat input and removing extra top border from chat input area.
